title: Citi Second Quarter 2011 Earnings Review
summary: New York – Citigroup will issue its second quarter results via press release at approximately 8 a.m. (EDT) on Friday, July 15, 2011. At 11 a.m. (EDT), results will be reviewed via live webcast and teleconference.
tag-2: New York – Citigroup will issue its second quarter results via press release at approximately 8 a.m. (EDT) on Friday, July 15, 2011. At 11 a.m. (EDT), results will be reviewed via live webcast and teleconference.
tag-3: The press release, webcast and presentation materials will be available at http://www.citigroup.com/citi/fin. A replay of the webcast will be available at http://www.citigroup.com/citi/fin/pres.htm.
tag-4: To dial-in to the live teleconference, please call (866) 516-9582 (for U.S. and Canada callers) or (973) 409-9210 (for international callers). Conference code: 74168196. A telephonic replay of the call will be available beginning approximately two hours after the event until Friday, July 29, 2011 by calling (800) 642-1687 (U.S. and Canada callers) or (706) 645-9291 (for international callers). Conference code: 74168196.
tag-5: Citi Citi, the leading global financial services company, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management. Additional information may be found at www.citigroup.com.
